info.description: This API gets and orders catalog items from different cloud sources.
info.title: Catalog API

get.summary: Return this API document in JSON format

200.description: The API document for this version of the API

get.description: Gets a list of portfolios.

200.description: Returns a list of portfolios. An empty list indicate either undefined portfolios in the system or inaccessibility to the caller.

requestBody.description: Parameters needed to add a Portfolio

get.description: Gets the portfolio specified by the portfolio ID.

requestBody.description: Parameters needed to update a Portfolio

delete.description: Deletes the portfolio specified by the ID.

422.description: Failed to discard child portfolio items.

get.summary: Get all portfolio items from a specific portfolio
get.description: Gets all portfilio items in the portfolio specified by the given ID.

200.description: Returns a list of portfolio items. An empty list is returned if the portfolio is not connected to any portfolio items.

post.summary: Add a portfolio item to a portfolio
post.description: Adds a new portfolio item to an existing portfolio.

200.description: Successfully added a portfolio item to the portfolio.

404.description: The portfolio or the portfolio item was not found.

post.summary: Share a portfolio with one or more groups with specific permission
post.description: Share a Portfolio with one or more groups with specific permissions

404.description: The Portfolio Object was not found.

422.description: One or more of the RBAC groups was not found

post.summary: Unshare a portfolio from one or more groups with specific permission
post.description: Unshare a Portfolio with one or more groups with specific permissions

404.description: The Portfolio Object or the one or more of the groups was not found.

get.summary: Fetch share information about this portfolio, the response would include a collection of groups and permissions with each group
get.description: Fetch share information about a portfolio

200.description: Returns an array of group uuid, name and permissions

post.summary: Make a copy of the Portfolio
post.description: Make a copy of the Portfolio.
Undeletes the portfolio specified by the portfolio ID.

get.summary: Fetches the specified portfolio's icon image
get.description: Fetch the specified portfolio's icon image.
Get a list of tenants.
Gets the tenant specified by the tenant id.

post.description: Run a task to seed the Tenant Groups required for an org admin to onboard additional users.

get.description: Gets a list of portfolio items.

200.description: Successfully returned a list of portfolio items.

post.description: Adds a name and description for a portfolio item and returns the newly created portfolio item.

get.description: Gets a specific portfolio item based on the portfolio item ID passed

200.description: Portfolio item specified by the given ID.

404.description: The portfolio item ID was not found

delete.description: Deletes the portfolio item based on portfolio item ID passed

patch.description: Edits portfolio item specified by the given ID.

requestBody.description: Parameters needed to update a Portfolio Item

200.description: Return the updated portfolio item object

404.description: The portfolio item ID was not found

get.summary: Gets all service plans for a specific portfolio item; requires a connection to the topology service.
get.description: Gets all service plans for a portfolio item.

500.description: Could not access the Topology Service

get.summary: Gets the provider control parameters for this portfolio item; requires control paramaters provided when provisioning the portfolio item.
get.description: Gets the provider control parameters for a portfolio item.

200.description: Return provider control parameters JSON object.

500.description: Could not access the Topology Service

post.description: If a record has been discarded, this operation will undelete it so it can be requested normally.

get.description: Gets a list of orders associated with the logged in user.

delete.description: Deletes the Order based on order ID passed

get.summary: Gets a list of items in a given order
get.description: Gets a list of items associated with an order.

200.description: Returns a OrderItemsCollection object with an embedded array of OrderIem objects

post.summary: Add an order item to an order in pending state
post.description: Adds an order item to an order in pending state

200.description: Successfully added an item to order

get.summary: Gets an individual order item from a given order
get.description: Gets an order item associated with an order.

404.description: Either the order or the order item could not be found.

post.description: Restores the order specified by the order ID.

get.description: Gets a list of order items.

200.description: Returns a list of order items. An empty list indicate either undefined orders in the system or inaccessibility to the caller.

get.description: Gets a specific order item based on the order item ID passed

200.description: Order item specified by the given ID.

404.description: The Order item ID was not found

delete.description: Deletes the order item  based on order item ID passed

post.description: Restores the order item specified by the order item ID.

get.summary: Gets a list of progress messages in an item
get.description: Gets a list of progress messages associated with an order item. As the item is being processed the provider can update the progress messages.

200.description: Returns a ProgressMessagesCollection object with an embedded array of ProgressMessage objects

get.summary: Gets a list of approval requests for an item
get.description: Gets a list of approval request associated with an order item. As the item is being approved one can check the status of the approvals.

200.description: Returns a ApprovalRequestCollection object with an embedded array of ProgressMessage objects

get.summary: Fetches the specified portfolio item's icon image
get.description: Fetch the specified portfolio item's icon image.

204.description: No icon present on Portfolio Item

post.summary: Make a copy of the Portfolio Item
post.description: Make a copy of the Portfolio Item.
Creates an Icon from the specified parameters

get.description: Fetch an Icon by ID

200.description: The Icon matching the Icon ID

patch.description: Edits Icon specified by the given ID.

requestBody.description: Parameters needed to update an Icon

delete.description: Deletes the icon based on the icon ID passed

get.description: Fetch the specified portfolio item's icon image.

get.summary: Get the next name for a the Portfolio Item prior to a copy operation
get.description: Get the next name for a the Portfolio Item prior to a copy operation
List Tenant Settings

200.description: The current tenant settings and schema

requestBody.description: Json encoded key/value pair to create a new setting

get.description: Get a specific Tenant Setting

DestinationPortfolioID.name: destination_portfolio_id
DestinationPortfolioID.description: The destination portfolio to compare names against

QueryLimit.name: limit
QueryLimit.description: The numbers of items to return per page.

QueryOffset.name: offset
QueryOffset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set.

InvalidEntity.description: The entity being created does not have either all the required parameters specified or the parameter value is invalid.

Forbidden.description: The caller is forbidden to perform the action.

Unauthorized.description: The caller is not authorized to access this resource.

UnprocessableEntity.description: The entity is currently in a state that does not allow the requested action

BasicAuth.description: The userid/password is needed when accessing this API externally

description.title: Description
description.example: This is a sample description for a portfolio.

image_url.title: Image URL
image_url.example: The public facing image url for a portfolio.

workflow_ref.title: Approval Workflow ID
workflow_ref.example: The current approval workflow selected for a portfolio

service_offering_ref.title: Service Offering Ref
service_offering_ref.description: The service offering ref should be retrieved from a call to the Topology Service.

portfolio_item_id.title: Portfolio Item Id
portfolio_item_id.description: This is the ID of the portfolio item object.

portfolio_id.title: Portfolio ID
portfolio_id.description: The portfolio to place the new copy of the Portfolio Item in

portfolio_item_name.title: Portfolio Item Name
portfolio_item_name.description: The name of the copied portfolio item

favorite.title: Favorite
favorite.example: Definition of a favorite portfolio item

orphan.title: Orphan
orphan.example: Boolean if an associated catalog item no longer exists

state.title: State
state.example: The current state of a portfolio item

display_name.title: Display Name
display_name.example: The name of the portfolio item to be displayed in the UI

long_description.title: Long Description
long_description.example: The longer description of a portfolio item

distributor.title: Distributor
distributor.example: The name of the provider for this Item

documentation_url.title: Documentation URL
documentation_url.example: The URL for documentation of the portfolio item

support_url.title: Support URL
support_url.example: The URL for finding support for the portfolio item

workflow_ref.title: Approval Workflow ID
workflow_ref.example: The approval workflow selected for a portfolio item

service_offering_source_ref.title: Service Offering Source Ref
service_offering_source_ref.description: The source reference this product was created from

order_request_sent_at.title: Order request sent at
order_request_sent_at.description: The time at which the order request was sent to the Topology Service

provider_control_parameters.title: Provider Control Parameters
provider_control_parameters.description: The provider specific parameters needed to provision this service. This might include namespaces, special keys.

service_plan_ref.title: The Service Plan ref
service_plan_ref.description: Stores the service plan ref from the Topology Service.

state.title: State
state.description: Current state of this order item.

order_id.title: Order ID
order_id.description: The Order that the OrderItem belongs to.

order_request_sent_at.title: Order request sent at
order_request_sent_at.description: The time at which the order request was sent to the Topology Service

external_url.title: External url
external_url.description: The external url of the service instance used with relation to this order item

insights_request_id.title: Insights Request ID
insights_request_id.description: The insights request id can be used to collect log data for this order item as its processed by the system

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier for this approval request.

approval_request_ref.title: Approval Request Ref
approval_request_ref.description: The id of the approval submitted to approval-api

order_item_id.title: Order Item ID
order_item_id.description: The Order Item which the approval request belongs to

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: The reason for the current state.

state.title: State
state.description: The state of the approval request (approved, denied, undecided, canceled)

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier for this Service Offering Icon

image_id.title: Image ID
image_id.description: The Image reference containing the binary image data for this icon

source_ref.title: Source Ref
source_ref.description: Stores the Source Ref for this icon

source_id.title: Source ID
source_id.description: The source ID for this icon

portfolio_id.title: Portfolio ID
portfolio_id.description: The portfolio this icon belongs to.

portfolio_item_id.title: Portfolio Item ID
portfolio_item_id.description: The portfolio_item this icon belongs to.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the service plan.

service_offering_id.title: Service Offering ID
service_offering_id.description: The reference ID of the service offering

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier for this service plan.

first.title: First Link
first.description: The link to fetch the first group of items in the result set

last.title: Last Link
last.description: The link to fetch the last group of items in the result set

prev.title: Previous Link
prev.description: The link to fetch the previous group of items in the result set

next.title: Next Link
next.description: The link to fetch the next group of items in the result set

count.title: Total number of items in the result set
count.description: Total number of items in the result set, of which only a subset is returned, defined by the QueryLimit parameter.

ProviderControlParameters.title: Provider Control Parameters
ProviderControlParameters.description: JSON Schema for Provider control parameters.

current.title: Current Settings
current.description: The current settings for this tenant

TenantSettingsSchema.title: Tenant Settings Schema
TenantSettingsSchema.description: JSON Schema for the Tenant Settings

permissions.title: Name
permissions.description: The permissions to apply for this share. Each permission comprises of 3 parts catalog:portfolios:verb separated by :. The valid verbs are read, write and order

group_uuids.title: The Group UUIDs
group_uuids.description: An array of group UUID's retrieved from the RBAC Service with whom the resource has to be shared.

permissions.title: Name
permissions.description: The permissions to remove for this resource.

group_uuids.title: The Group UUIDs
group_uuids.description: An array of group UUID's retrieved from the RBAC Service from which the permissions have to be removed. If group uuids are not specified we will unshare it from all groups.

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.description: One or more permissions currently applied to this group.

operationName.description: If the Query contains several named operations, the operationName controls which one should be executed

errors.description: Errors resulting from the GraphQL query
